title._content: Image taken from page 3 of 'Memoir upon the late War in North America, between the French and English, 1755-60; followed by observations upon the theatre of actual war, ... with topographical maps ... Translated [from the French] and edited by F. B. Hough

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Memoir upon the late War in North America, between the French and English, 1755-60; followed by observations upon the theatre of actual war, ... with topographical maps ... Translated [from the French] and edited by F. B. Hough. With additional notes and illustrations. L.P" Author: POUCHOT, François. Contributor: HOUGH, Franklin Benjamin. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9604.i.2." Volume: 01 Page: 3 Place of Publishing: Roxbury, Mass Date of Publishing: 1866 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002970779 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
